name: Old Moore's Almanack (IAPSOP)
content:
Old Moore's Almanack (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Old Moore's Almanack Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Old Moore's Almanac. Vox Stellarum. Other titles: Vox Stellarum, etc. 1701-1916? Annual London, England. Publisher: W. Foulsham & Co. . Editor: Francis Moore, Tycho Wing, Henry Andrews, et al. Longest running astrological almanac in the world. It began in 1701 as Francis Moore's Old Moore: An Ancient Almanac, Offering Astrological Forces and Determinants. A monthly companion, Old Moore's Monthly Messenger, was started in 1907. Issues:Old Moore's Almanack 1916
